column4: As hunt for Allergan drags on  some Valeant owners have doubts
column5: NEW YORK/BOSTON A few months ago  an innovative partnership between Valeant Pharmaceuticals  and billionaire investor William Ackman to buy Botox maker Allergan Inc  looked like a blueprint for success. Now some Valeant shareholders who backed the deal at its start are questioning whether it will become reality.
